summary:
Adds a heavy set version of the deathbrand.
*Doesnt replace the original light armor set.*
descriptionHtml:
-Deatails-
This mod adds a heavy set version of the deathbrand. The armor is on Haknir Death-Brand so you need to have the dungeon unlocked to be able to acquire the armor.

-Notes-
*Requires Dragonborn*
*Doesnt replace the original light armor set.*

-Update-
v1.1-Changed from being found in a chest to being found on Haknir Death-Brand. So you will not be able to find the armor in a random cheast 

v1.2-Fixed a bug where armor dosnt benifit from heavy armor perk tree

-Bugs-
If you find any bugs please let me know
author: ReputedRug
